General.Name: Shanxi Xinghuacun Fen Wine Factory Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanxi Xinghuacun Fen Wine Factory Co.,Ltd. produces and sells wine in China. The company operates in the United States, Australia, the United Kingdom, and Japan. Shanxi Xinghuacun Fen Wine Factory Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1949 and is based in Fenyang, China. The company operates as a subsidiary of Shanxi Xinghua Village Fenjiu Group Co., Ltd.
